product_name: Deuter ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL Pack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL is a lightweight backpacking pack featuring a slim body profile, big stretch-woven front stuff-it pocket and an X-frame back system to carry large loads on multiday trips.
short_description: The ACT Lite 70 + 10 SL is a lightweight backpacking pack featuring a slim body profile, big stretch-woven front stuff-it pocket and an X-frame back system to carry large loads on multiday trips.
